location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Kuwait State. Basra Division. Khuzistan Province. - 'Iraq, Kuwait and Persia. No. 10 B & C, Khuramshahr (Mohammerah)'

mods.abstract: The map shows Khuramshahr (Mohammerah) and the surrounding area. The map indicates hydrology, settlements, roads, railway lines, vegetation and provides some indication of relief. A glossary of Persian terms used is printed below the map.Published under the direction of Brigadier H J Crouchman, DSO, MC, Surveyor General of India, 1936.
